meanings.sent1: The indocile puppy refused to learn any tricks.
meanings.sent2: The teacher found the indocile student challenging to manage in class.
meanings.sent3: The indocile kitten kept knocking over the toy box for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her indocile hair refused to stay in place no matter how much she brushed it.
meanings.sent5: The indocile wind whipped through the trees, scattering leaves in all directions.

meanings.sent1: The indocile child ran around the room, ignoring all instructions.
meanings.sent2: The indocile behavior of the teenagers caused chaos at the party.
meanings.sent3: The indocile cat kept sneaking out of the house despite being told not to.
meanings.sent4: The indocile river overflowed its banks, flooding the nearby fields.
meanings.sent5: The indocile storm raged on, ignoring all forecasts and warnings.
